Description copied from interface: ISysExtendableTable
Return the state of the rows concerning changes.

Specified by:
hasFixRowCount in interface ISysExtendableTable
Returns:
true if the rows can be manipulated. That is rows can be appended and removed. Else returns false.

clear

public void clear()
Description copied from interface: ISysExtendableTable
Clear the table. Delete all the rows of the table. The columns are not deleted.
This corresponds to ISysExtendableTable.deleteRow(int) for all rows.
